arStrings.szText: When you break {c_important}{u}Stealth{/u}{/c} with an attack, you drop a cluster of exploding {c_important}Stun Grenades{/c} around your location that deal {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} total Physical damage and Stun enemies for {c_number}[PowerTag.Rogue_Grenades."Script Formula 2"|2|]{/c} seconds.
